name: part_008
file: tmp_【NO DOWN TIME!!】Mori Calliope 3D Birthday Live 2024 #NODOWNTIME2024 [sdzbH7LX80w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs a cover of 'Zanki' by ZUTOMAYO.
MC section where Calliope thanks the audience and announces merch.
Visual display of Birthday Celebration 2024 merch.

subtitles.original: しょっぱいぜ
subtitles.english: It's salty

subtitles.original: 初めて嗅いで舐めた出会い
subtitles.english: The encounter I first smelled and tasted

subtitles.original: 自暴自棄です 平均的な正論がビンボー
subtitles.english: I'm desperate; average sound logic is poor

subtitles.original: いらっしゃいませ
subtitles.english: Welcome

subtitles.original: ニンニク増して目指して健康体
subtitles.english: Aiming for a healthy body with extra garlic

subtitles.original: 腹歌満たしてる
subtitles.english: Filling up with a belly song

subtitles.original: 悠長さ 無知なフリして当たっちゃって
subtitles.english: Leisureliness, hitting it while pretending to be ignorant

subtitles.original: 欠点です 現状把握そこから中断中
subtitles.english: It's a flaw; understanding the current situation, suspended from there

subtitles.original: もう譲渡 見せびらかし合いましょ
subtitles.english: Already a transfer; let's show off to each other

subtitles.original: 劣等感も変えられやしないって
subtitles.english: They say inferiority complexes won't change

subtitles.original: わかってるからぁ？
subtitles.english: Do you understand?

subtitles.original: 直感で自己中な
subtitles.english: Intuitive and selfish

subtitles.original: 理解不能プレイヤー
subtitles.english: Incomprehensible player

subtitles.original: 求められたなら惨事会
subtitles.english: If requested, a disaster meeting

subtitles.original: くだらん口喧嘩でマシになった
subtitles.english: It got better with a stupid quarrel

subtitles.original: もっともっと 意外と辛いのに
subtitles.english: More, more, even though it's surprisingly painful

subtitles.original: うざいくらい叫んだって喰らったって譲れない日々よ
subtitles.english: Days I won't give up, even if I scream or take it until it's annoying

subtitles.original: 栄養になって また汚しあえ
subtitles.english: Become nourishment and soil each other again

subtitles.original: わかんなくて 我慢なって脊髄反射の涙腺は
subtitles.english: I don't understand, I can't take it, and my tear ducts reflect my spinal cord

subtitles.original: 濁った声で歌えば感謝です
subtitles.english: If I sing with a muddy voice, I'm grateful

subtitles.original: 試したいわ あたたかくて
subtitles.english: I want to try it, it's so warm

subtitles.original: 絶体絶命な 夜は気持ちいい
subtitles.english: The desperate nights feel so good

subtitles.original: 平凡な生活 夢見たけど
subtitles.english: I dreamed of an ordinary life, but...

subtitles.original: 先手必勝が 気持ちいいな
subtitles.english: Winning by taking the initiative feels good

subtitles.original: 帰ってすぐに水やり 人間の営み
subtitles.english: Watering plants right after returning home, human activities

subtitles.english: To be honest, even if blessed, a sense of emptiness is my friend

subtitles.original: 眠気覚まし耳打ち 飲み干すまで合図
subtitles.english: Whispering to wake up, a signal until I drink it all

subtitles.english: I just want to be calm

subtitles.english: If you don't want to cause trouble

subtitles.english: I won't let you say you have to die

subtitles.english: It was simple and clear

subtitles.original: 濁った声で歌えば感謝です
subtitles.english: If I sing with a muddy voice, I'm grateful

subtitles.original: 言いたいことジャンケンで負けちゃって
subtitles.english: Losing at rock-paper-scissors for what I want to say

subtitles.original: まずは実感まで 拵え
subtitles.english: First, prepare yourself until you feel it

subtitles.original: すぐ吐けなくて 呆気なくて脊髄反射の涙腺は
subtitles.english: Can't spit it out right away, empty-headed, and my tear ducts reflect my spinal cord

subtitles.original: 萎んだ脳で歌えば感謝です
subtitles.english: If I sing with a shriveled brain, I'm grateful

subtitles.original: だりいし痒いし薄っぺらい下らないことで歌えて勝った
subtitles.english: It's dull, itchy, thin, and stupid, but I won by singing

subtitles.original: 賄えないじゃ満たされない不快感
subtitles.english: An unsatisfiable discomfort if I can't cover it

subtitles.original: 暴れる脳は暴れるでも慣れない
subtitles.english: The thrashing brain thrashes, but I don't get used to it

subtitles.original: 傷にはセッションで絶頂で健康体 気持ちいいな
subtitles.english: Sessions for wounds, peaks for a healthy body, it feels good

subtitles.original: Yay! Thank you so much everybody! That was Zanki, Time Left.
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you so much everybody! That was Zanki, Time Left.

subtitles.original: Speaking of time left, there is none. There's no time left!
subtitles.english: Speaking of time left, there is none. There's no time left!

subtitles.original: But, uh, this has been a really, really amazing "No Down Time" live show with you guys and all of the amazing guests that came here.
subtitles.english: But, uh, this has been a really, really amazing "No Down Time" live show with you guys and all of the amazing guests that came here.

subtitles.original: So thank you so much for coming to support me and have a great live show. My fourth one. Wow, my fourth...
subtitles.english: So thank you so much for coming to support me and have a great live show. My fourth one. Wow, my fourth...

subtitles.original: ...my fourth birthday here in Holo, and I'm so, so happy to have gotten this chance to celebrate it with you here in the Underworld.
subtitles.english: ...my fourth birthday here in Holo, and I'm so, so happy to have gotten this chance to celebrate it with you here in the Underworld.

subtitles.original: It was fantastic. But, you know, it is my birthday, and when it comes to birthdays, there's... there's something important to announce.
subtitles.english: It was fantastic. But, you know, it is my birthday, and when it comes to birthdays, there's... there's something important to announce.

subtitles.original: What does everybody announce during their birthday? Uh... hold on, I'm thinking.
subtitles.english: What does everybody announce during their birthday? Uh... hold on, I'm thinking.

subtitles.original: I don't know. I forgot. I forgot.
subtitles.english: I don't know. I forgot. I forgot.

subtitles.original: Wait, it's... I remember, I remember! I remember!
subtitles.english: Wait, it's... I remember, I remember! I remember!

subtitles.original: Rebeats, I'm a little scatterbrained, I'm sorry. It's because I'm excited.
subtitles.english: Rebeats, I'm a little scatterbrained, I'm sorry. It's because I'm excited.

subtitles.original: Birthday goods! Ta-da!
subtitles.english: Birthday goods! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Birthday Celebration 2024
subtitles.english: Birthday Celebration 2024
